SUSPENSION TOOL LHARC 0.1 by Stoppered.
Binds: always on "F12" - active suspension lower/upper toggle
Binds: only on when F12 is enabled "Mouse scroll UP" - Raises the car's suspension "Mouse scroll DOWN" - Lower the car's suspension ----- "Numpad +" - Raises the car's suspension "Numpad - " - Lower the car's suspension ----- "Hold CTRL" - Allows change the suspension to button click
